profile_positions.location: Bergen op Zoom, North Brabant, Netherlands
profile_positions.description: Project management, competency development related to liquid crystals, functional surfaces, wettability and solubility parameters, strategic roadmaping, scientific advisor of the  Stimuli-responsive Functional Materials & Devices (SFD) group of the Eindhoven University.
profile_positions.title: Staff Scientist - Tech Megatrends and Incubation

profile_positions.description: Project management, material development in the fields of functional surfaces, liquid crystals and display films.
profile_positions.title: Staff Scientist, High Performance Forms

profile_positions.description: Project management and material development in the fields of functional surfaces and display films.
profile_positions.title: Lead Scientist - High Performance Forms

profile_positions.description: Competency development & management with special focus on functional surfaces and wettability, strategic roadmaping, scientific networking.
profile_positions.title: Lead Scientist - Materials Science, Functional Surfaces

profile_positions.description: Project management, automotive material development, competitive activity monitoring.
profile_positions.title: Automotive Technology Engineer

profile_positions.description: Holst Centre is an open innovation R&D centre that develops generic technologies for Wireless Autonomous Transducer Solutions and System in Foil (e.g. Light Electric Diodes and Organic Photovoltaic Cells). I was working in the field of organic photovoltaics in collaboration with the Energy Research Centre of the Netherlands (ECN).
profile_positions.title: Researcher

profile_positions.description: Twelve-month post-doc at the University of Warwick (UK), in the Polymer Colloid group headed by Dr. Stefan Bon, in collaboration with industry. One of the main activities of the group is the liquid-liquid interface-driven assembly of solid particles to fabricate supracolloidal structures.
profile_positions.title: Research Fellow

profile_positions.description: The topic of this traineeship in the R&D department of the company was the study of the influence of nucleating agents on the crystallizaion behavior of polybutylene.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

profile_positions.description: The target of this internship was the improvement of the physical properties of modified polychloropren (trade name: Baypren®) in order to promote an easier processing (R&D department).
profile_positions.title: Trainee

profile_positions.description: I worked on the conductivity of a thin polymer layer between two glass slabs and on the photopolymerization of acrylates (R&D department).
profile_positions.title: Trainee
